title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: South Park Elementary, day. Grass shows up around the edges of the snow-covered lawns and around the flagpole.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: The school gym. Six cheerleaders, all fourth-graders, lead a Pep Rally '04.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: We are South Park, Green and White. Let's go, Cows! Fight fight fight! Nobody can beat a Cow! Let's gooo, South Park!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Hey, South Park! Do you have school spirit?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Moooooooo!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: I think us Cows have the best school spirit. Huh, Mandy?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Yeah, and South Park is really gonna stick it to Littleton next week!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Let's bring out our mascot and get this pep rally going!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: It's Billy! Uh, Billy will wave for me! Wave for me, Billy!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: We are People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals! We protest your insensitive use of cows as your school mascot!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Oh Jesus, not PETA again.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Culled or maimed and slaughtered and used as a commodity!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: This is unfair to the cows! This is your insensitivity!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: EWWW!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: The cow is a slave! The cow is a commodity! To be thrown away by a society gone wrong!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Mr. Garrison's class, day. The class is seated

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: All right, children, I have just been informed that since our school has been attacked by eco-terrorists for the 47th time, we are going to change our school mascot.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: AWWWWWWWWW!!!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Buh, Mr. Garrision, if we change our mascot, that means the eco-terrorists win!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: That's right, Stanley, the eco-terrorists win.  Now, I have here a mascot selection sheet. Every student is supposed to check the box next to the mascot they like the most. And the most popular selection will be the school's new mascot.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: But we like being the Cows!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: You're responsible for the enslavement and genocide of millions!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Get, get outta here, PETA! We're changin' the mascot already!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Who'll speak for those who cannot speak for themselves??

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Go on, get, get outta here!  Get, get out!  Jesus, where do they keep coming from??  Go on, get outta here.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: This is bullcrap, dude!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Now children, it's not that bad. There's plenty of great new mascots on the sheet to chose from. The Hurricanes, the Blizzards, the Redskins, the Indians...

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: But aren't Indians and Redskins just as offensive?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: No, those are fine. PETA doesn't care about people.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: The school hallway

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Goddamnit PETAns piss me off! We're never gonna end up with a stupid eagle or a faggy bobcat as a mascot.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Wait. You guys, I have an awesome idea! We should secretly go around and tell all the students we can to not check any of the mascots on this election sheet, and instead write in "Giant Douche."

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Ye-heah!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: (Yeah, totally awesome!)

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Yeh- no, no, wait wait wait. I got a better idea you guys. What we should do is we should secretly go around and tell all the students we can to not check any of the mascots on this election sheet, and instead write in "Turd Sandwich."

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Turd Sandwich isn't better than Giant Douche.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Heh, it's only about a thousand times better, am I right guys? Come on! We have to tell everybody fast! This is gonna be soo funny!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: It was MY idea and we're gonna tell everyone to write in "Giant Douche!" It's way funnier!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: IT IS NOT!!!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Kenny, what's funnier? A giant douche or a turd sandwich?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: (Giant douche.)

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Aw, you're just saying that because I broke your cat's leg last week.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Stan, do you pick giant douche or turd sandwich?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Dude, I really don't care.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: That's two against one, 'cause Stan doesn't care. So it's giant douche.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: ...Wait wait, what about Butters?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Huh?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: You hate Butters.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Goddamnit you guys, Butters is our friend! And he's allowed to have his opinion! Butters, which is funnier? A stupid not-funny giant douche or a super funny turd sandwich?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Hahaa, a turd sandwich!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: You misled him, fatass!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: It's the best choice, and me and Butters are sticking with it.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Yeah! ...What's this for?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Jimmy, we're gonna have everyone write in a mascot that's really funny, and you have to tell us which one would be funnier..

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: That''s a... fantastic idea fellas. Uh, the key to successful humor is s- staying power. Uh tell me the first mascot idea.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: A giant douche.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Heh, huh okay, that's pretty funny. Now, what's the second?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: A turd sandwich.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Turhr... Ohokahay. Okay, now let's wait ten seconds.  Okay now, t-tell me the first one again?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Giant douche.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: And the second?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Turd sandwich.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Gee, th-they're both screamingly funny, fellas. Uhhhbetter give it another ten seconds. All right, now we'll see which one really has staying power. Number one?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: A giant douche.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Okay, I think, that's it. Number 2?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Turd sandwich.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Gee, I don't know what to say, fellas. They're both instant classics. But I guess I'll have to go with giant douche, simply because the fact that it's a giant renders it useless, adding a parody slant to the satire.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: AWWWW!!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Ohhh, we lost?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: All right, it's decided. Let's all write in "Giant Douche."

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Okay. You win, Kyle.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: The school gym. The students once again assembles on the bleachers. Mr. Garrison stands before the big-screen TV used in the rally earlier, and the TV reads "New School Mascot '04"

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Attention students, we have tallied your mascot nomination sheets, and there will now be a school-wide vote between the top two nominations. So here is the first most-requested candidate, a giant douche.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Go giant douche!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Hey, South Park! Have we got school spirit??  We've got spirit, yes we do! Giant douches, me and you! Let's gooooo, Douches!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: And now your second nominee, Turd Sandwich.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: All right turd sandwich!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Yeah!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Cartman? What the hell??

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Giant Douche sucks!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: We've got spirit, yes we do! We are sandwiches filled with poo! Yeeaahhh!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Students can now cast their choice between the Giant Douche and the Turd Sandwich. We'll count up the votes on Tuesday.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: You won't get more votes than us, asshole!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Dream on, Jew boy!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Yeah, dream on, Jew boy!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: The front doors of the school. Stan and Kenny flank the entrance and hand out buttons as the other kids come out

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Be sure to vote for Giant Douche.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: (Giant Douche! Vote for him!)

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Giant Douche is your man!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Kyle, aren't you taking this a little too far? I mean, do we really want a giant douche to be our school mascot?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Dude, I'm not going to lose to Cartman's stupid turd sandwich.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Vote for Turd Sandwich. This is the most important election of our lives. Turd Sandwich brings us hope for change. A vote for Turd Sandwich is a Vote for Tomorrow!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: There. Do you really want that asshole to win?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: I'm not voting!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: What? Y-you gotta vote, dude. Haven't you seen the Rock the Vote stuff or, or Puff Daddy's Vote or Die??

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: I just think this whole thing is stupid!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Kenny, we have got to make Stan understand the importance of voting, because he'll definitely vote for our guy.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: (Yeah.)

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: The Marsh house, dinnertime. The family is gathered at table, with Grandpa at one end, Randy at the other. Sharon comes in with plates and the main course

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: How was school today, Stanley?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: It was ridiculous. We have to have a new school mascot and we're supposed to vote between a giant douche and a turd sandwich.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: ...What did you say?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Did you just say that... voting is ridiculous?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: No, I think voting is great, but, if I have to choose between a douche and a turd, I just don't see the point.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: You don't see the point!! Oh you young people just make me sick!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Stanley, do you know how many people died so you could have the right to vote?!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Mom, a-I just don't think there's much of a difference between a douche and a turd. I d-I don't care.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: You don't care?! You really want a turd sandwich as your school mascot?! On your football helmets?! A turd?!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Well, hold on, Randy, I think a turd sandwich is a little better than them having a giant douche on their uniforms.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: You're crazy!! A d-a douche is at least clean!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: It's sexist is what it is!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: You don't understand the issues, Sharon!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Are you calling me ignorant??

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: You think the school mascot should be a turd sandwich? Well you're not exactly Einstein!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: I am sick of you belittling my opinion, you son of a bitch!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: I hate this family, I hate it!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Puff Daddy?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Your friend Kyle said you don't understand the importance of voting.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Apparently you haven't heard of my "Vote or Die" campaign.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: "Vote or Die"?  What the hell does that even mean?!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: What you think it means, bitch!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: AAAAH!!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Music video. Stan is running down the street. An open-roof car pops up behind him and bears down on him

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Vote or die, mother_, mother_er, vote or die!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Rock the vote or else I'm gonna stick a knife through your eye.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Democracy is founded on one simple rule!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Overhead shot of Puff Daddy, dressed in a white suit, then in a black suit.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Get out there and vote or I will mother__ kill you.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: at a polling station encouraging one female voter

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: I like it when you vote, bitch! (bitch!)

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
role: Shake them titties when you vote, bitch! (bitch!)

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: seated as two women dance for him, their asses in his face

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: I slam my jimmy through your mouth roof (mouth roof)

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: gently spanks a woman as she goes in to vote

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Now get your big ass in the pollin' booth.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Fish-eye overhead view of Puff Daddy. He shoves his gun into the camera

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: I said vote, bitch, or I'll f_____ kill you!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Stan runs until he sees a passageway between two buildings. He does in to try to escape, but Puff Daddy and his crew find him

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Vote or die, mother_, mother_, vote or die!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: You can't run from a .38, go ahead and try!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Puffy is seated in an armchair wearing a wig, surrounded by women, all in front of a Vegas-style sign saying "DIDDY"

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Let your opinion be heard! You gotta make a choice

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: raps to a chrome reflection

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: 'Cause after I slit your throat you won't have a f____ voice

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Stan runs again, looking behind him, but runs into a gun in his face

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: 'Vote or die! Vote or die!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Puff Daddy's gun is joined by the guns of his posse. Stan is looking at five barrels

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Okay. I'll vote.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Cartman and Butters begin door-to-door campaigning. Cartman knocks on a door and Clyde answers.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Hello, Clyde.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: What do you guys want?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: We were just wondering who you might be voting for, for the school's new mascot.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: I haven't decided yet.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Oh really? Well that's interesting. You certainly should think about it and make the right decision.  Butterscotch candy?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Sure.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Clyde, are you aware of what Turd Sandwich can bring to our school?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: A turd sandwich is not only the first turd to be nominated school mascot, but even the first, sandwich.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: You see, what Turd Sandwich brings to our school, Clyde, is a complete package. The turd and the coin. And the lettuce, and the olives.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Whe-whereas Giant Douche is just, well, ju-just a, ju-ju-just a giant douche.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: So, come voting day, you'll now most likely vote for the turd sandwich, yes?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: I'm still not totally sure.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Well then, perhaps we could interest you in  another butterscotch candy?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: South Park Elementary, now a polling station. A "Vote for School Mascot!" hangs on the back wall and over the hallway. A reluctant Kyle takes a ballot, and Kyle smiles, thinking he has Stan on his side

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: You're doing the right thing, Stan. Don't you feel like you're a part of something now?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: I guess...

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Look, it may not seem important now, but your vote really does count, and we all have to do our part.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Okay.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Look... wait, what are you doing?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: I'm voting.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: No, no, you... you wrote down Turd Sandwich.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Yeah, I know.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: ...Dude, you're supposed to vote for Giant Douche.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: I thoght I was supposed to make my own decision.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Well yeah, but not if your decision is for Turd Sandwich! What the hell is wrong with you?!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Wait a minute, you didn't want me to vote, you wanted me to vote for your guy!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Well, I just figured you'd vote for my guy! Who's fuckin' friend are you?! Puffy!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Hey, fuck off, Kyle.  Don't let them intimidate you, Stan. I'll help walk you to the booth. And then I'm gonna buy you a niiice steak dinner with all the trimmings.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Oh forget it! I'm not gonna be persuaded into voting and I'm and I'm not gonna be threatened into voting if I don't feel comfortable with it! I'm not gonna vote and you can all just live with it!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: The Principal's Office, later

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: We've simply had it with your son, Mr. and Mrs. Marsh. Voting just doesn't appear to be important to 'im.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Stanley, when you left for school this morning, you said you were going to vote!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: The whole thing is a joke!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: You see? He's out of control. It's nearly torn our whole family apart.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Well, my hands are tied. We can no longer have Stan's behavior jeopardizing the other children. He must be removed.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Ogh! Are you happy now, Stan? You just got yourself suspended!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Nno, I'm afraid it's worse than that. By county law I'm bound to enforce the harshest punishment possible.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Expulsion??

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: No. Banishment.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: B-bani-banishment?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: You can appeal to the city council, but I don't think it'll do any good. Your son must leave South Park, never to return.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Oh, Randy!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Our son, banished. Where did we go wrong??

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Ya... you're all joking, right?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: A moonlit partly-cloudy night in South Park. The townsfolk are gathered at the edge of town, with Stan facing them all alone. A horse stands at the ready on one side of Main Street.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: As it was in the times of our forefathers, so it is now. Stan Marsh, for not following our most sacred of rites, you are hereby banished from South Park for all eternity. Or until you decide that voting is important. Good-bye, Stan. May the gods treat you more kindly than we did.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Stan, don't you think this has gone far enough? Is it really that big a deal?  Yeah, just vote. For Giant Douche.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: I'm not voting!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: You, Puffy man, are we just gonna let this happen?  We've gots to kill this non-votin' fool!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: No, Justacious, let him go. He won't survive a fortnight in the wilderness.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: This is breaking your mother's heart, Stan. She couldn't even help tie you to the horse.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Dad, isn't this a little extreme?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Jesus. I guess maybe you'll never understand how important voting is.  Goodbye, Stan. That's... one of the hardest things a parent ever has to do.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: A plain, night. Stan rides into the night and into the morning on the plain, then through a desert, then into a forest. A group of people appear and spot him

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Look! What is that?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Oh, the poor thing!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Hello?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Don't worry, we'll free you.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Just sit still for a moment.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Oh thank God.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Get offa him, you filthy human!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Poor thing needs water.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: You'er safe now.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Shame on you, making this horse your slave.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Awww!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Come, you can live with us.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: We will give you food and shelter.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: What about me?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: OPEN THE GATE!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: This poor creature is in need of food and water.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: You have a home here, friend.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: The... kid wants to stay, too.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: I was put on the horse. I didn't wanna ride it.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: I don't know if you can stay. We'll have to ask Dr. Cornwallis. Come.  We don't normally allow outsiders. See, here we live in harmony with animals. They're not our pets but our fellow living beings. We work with the animals and try to live as they do.  We make friends with the animals. We coexist, and we... intermarry.  This is my wife, Janice.  The outside world looks down on a man marrying a llama, but our love knows no boundaries.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Wow, you guys really love animals.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: And why not? Mark here has been with Kelly for three years now.  And Gary and Sally here have just managed to have a child together.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Kill me...

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Yes, life here is good and natural. But now that you know where our compound is, you'll either have to live with us, or be murdered.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: I'll live with you.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: It's not up to you. You'll have to talk with Dr. Cornwallis.  What did he say?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: He said I can stay

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Excellent! Dr. Cornwallis is wise beyond his year. Here's your PETA shirt and a bumper sticker.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: This is Debate 2004 with your host, Jim Lehrer.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Welcome to the cable-access televised debate between a giant douche  and a turd sandwich  We'll start with Giant Douche. Sir, some students and parents are reluctant to have a... giant douche represent them. What do you say to those people?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Jim, first of all I would like to thank you for monitoring this debate. And I would like to thank all of the students and their parents for coming.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Aww, suck-up, suck-up!  What?! It's an obvious suck-up move.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: But I would hope that those students and their parents who question my qualities would simply look at my opponent. He is a turd sandwich

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: You're a turd sandwich.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: ... No, sir, if you'll pardon me, you are in fact, the turd sandwich.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: You're a turd sandwich.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: ... Sir, you are a turd sandwich.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: You're a turd sandwich.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Ahh, Turd Sandwich, I will ask you not to speak out of turn.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: I I'm sorry, Jim.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Anyway, as I was saying, ahh... wait, I I forgot what I was saying.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Ha. Wha-hat a douche.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: All right, Turd Sandwich, this next question is for you. How should South Park Elementary enforce its laws of conduct for young athletes during sporting events.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: ... Uh you know, uh, my opponent wouldn't even know the answer to that question. If you ask him the same question, he would not answer it.  He would stand around and just babble on and on about nothing until he was finally saved by the buzzer sound.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Your time is up, Turd.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: The PETA compound, next morning. Stan scrubs away at the empty tubs and buckets of food the animals ate from the previous day. The bald man approachs

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Stan, I want to introduce you to my stepdaughter, Teresa.  She seems to have taken a liking to you.  And she's ovulating.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Ahh no thanks, that's okay.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Stan, some PETA members are growing concerned that maybe you don't love animals.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: I do love animals, just ...nnot like you guys do.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: You... don't belong here, Stan. You should return home.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: I can't. I was banished for not voting.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: But, why on earth wouldn't you wanna vote?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: I think voting is great. I just didn't care this time because it was between a giant douche and a turd sandwich.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: But Stan, don't you know, it's always between a giant douche and a turd sandwich. Nearly every election since the beginning of time has been between some douche and some turd. They're the only people who suck up enough to make it that far in politics.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: I guess... I guess you're right.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Yo, what did I say was going to happen to you, bitch?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: AAAAAH!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Aaaah!! He's wearing the skin of an animal!  Take that!  I... hope that teaches you a lesson about being hurt.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Itius, Rodicus!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Vote or die!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: AAAAH!!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Protect the animals! Protect the animals!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Janice, we shall die together in each other's arms!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Kill me! Kill meee!!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: South Park Elementary polling station. Mr. Mackey tallies up the votes.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: M'kay, that's one more vote for Turd Sandwich.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: So who won, Mr. Mackey?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: It's pretty close, but it looks like Giant Douche is gonna win.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Oh no! NOOO!!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: HA! You lose, fatass!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Uh hey, wait a minute!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Stan!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Stan, you came back. Does that mean... you learned the importance of voting?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: I learned that I'd better get used to having to pick between a douche and a turd sandwich because it's usually the choice I'll have.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: He's going to vote!!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: He's going to vote. He's going to vote.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Let's get out the vote! Let's make our voices heard!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
role: We've been given the right to choose between a douche and a turd.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
role: It's democracy in action! Put your freedom to the test.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
role: A big fat turd or a stupid douche. Which do you like best?

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Stan's vote bring the total votes for Turd Sandwich to... thirty six! And Giant Douche has... one thousand four hundred and ten. Giant Douche still wins.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Yeah! All right!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: AWWWW!!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Dude, so my vote didn't even really matter!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Hey! That's not true, Stan.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: You can't judge the merits of voting on whether or not your candidate won.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Your vote still mattered.

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Hey everybody!  They just found all the PETA members murdered at their compound!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: What the? They're all dead? Well, that means...

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: That we can go back to being the South Park Cows!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Hooray! All right!

title: DOUCHE AND TURD
text: Naw, your vote didn't matter.
